entry.title: Monday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:45 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
